metadata.summary: Forensic timeline generation extension that processes triage collections using log2timeline and psort tools
metadata.primary_use_case: Create comprehensive forensic timelines from endpoint triage collections for incident investigation

extracted_apis.description: Parse forensic artifacts and generate timeline
Extract metadata and processing summary from plaso file

cross_refs.description: Requires artifacts to be collected before Plaso can process them
Commonly processes Velociraptor KAPE triage collections
